summary: The U.S. Citrus Protection Act (H.R. 1507) aims to prohibit the importation of commercially produced fresh citrus fruit originating from the People's Republic of China. The bill mandates this prohibition, overriding other existing laws.  It will take effect 90 days after its enactment. This legislation is sponsored by Mr. Steube and Mr. Webster of Florida and was introduced in the House of Representatives on February 21, 2025.
